Package view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GUIFactory
    This interface uses an Abstract Factory pattern to define some common aspects of the GUI and to facilitate their change.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FontLoader
    An utility class to register fonts.
    GUIFactory.Standard
    A standard implementation of GUIFactory.
    ImageLoader
    This utility class is used as an image loader for the application.
    InputHandler
    This class handles the keyboard input for the actions that can be performed in the game.
    LanguageHandler
    This class uses a Singleton Pattern to make a language handler for the application.
    TextParticle
    This class handles the representation of an animated text on the specified Graphics.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageLoader.GameImage
    Enumeration for all game images.
    InputAction
    This enumeration describes the actions that can be performed from a user input.
    LanguageHandler.Language
    This enumeration represents the languages supported by the application.
    SoundEffect
    This enum encapsulates all the sound effects of the game, so as to separate the sound playing codes from the game codes. 1.
